body:
Theoretically the maskTopography and the ShadingmaskII should be similar (the mask) and as such their influence.

I'm not sure if your case is influenced by the geometry of the room and it's orientation and window locations, rather than the mask itself.

I would try a basic case (one room, one window) that you can check parametrically (orientation, window size, etc) in order to understand better the mask influence.

-A.
